title: Leonardo Vaca
text:
Leonardo Vaca Gutiérrez (born November 24, 1995) is a <a href="Bolivian%20people">Bolivian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Midfielder%20%28association%20football%29">striker</a> currently playing for <a href="Club%20Bol%C3%ADvar">Club Bolívar</a> in the <a href="Liga%20de%20F%C3%BAtbol%20Profesional%20Boliviano">Liga de Fútbol Profesional Boliviano</a>.
International career.
Vaca was summoned to the <a href="Bolivia%20national%20under-20%20football%20team">Bolivian U-20</a> team to play in the <a href="2015%20South%20American%20Youth%20Football%20Championship">2015 South American Youth Football Championship</a>.
He was named in Bolivia's senior squad for a <a href="2018%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">2018 FIFA World Cup</a> qualifier against <a href="Colombia%20national%20football%20team">Colombia</a> in March 2016.
